document.body:
Grocery Coupon Helper
Times are tough and saving money is important. Coupon savings with out the research. Jan 22 ZonePerfect Bar–FREE Posted by admin. Comment (0) .
King Soopers has ZonePerfect Bar on sale for .99/ea. This Sunday’s coupon insert has a coupon for .55/1 ZonePerfect Bar or multipack. Final price for the ZonePerfect Bar is FREE!
This entry was posted on Sunday, January 22nd, 2012 at 10:09 pm by admin.
Filed under: King Soopers , Pantry , Weekly Sales .You can follow any responses to this entry through the RSS 2.0 feed.
You can leave a response , or trackback from your own site.
